items.title: Digital Twin Platform Development
items.description: Core development of the national digital twin platform infrastructure, enabling data integration and interoperability across Swedish cities.

items.title: Urban Microclimate Analysis
items.description: Advanced simulation tools for analyzing urban microclimates, supporting climate adaptation strategies and outdoor comfort assessments.

items.title: Energy Optimization in Buildings
items.description: Digital twin models for optimizing energy consumption in buildings and districts, supporting sustainable urban development.

items.title: Infrastructure Monitoring and Maintenance
items.description: Real-time monitoring and predictive maintenance systems for urban infrastructure using digital twin technology.
